Dialogue.message: Hi welcome to Mowrey! What would you like to know more about?
What would you like to know about the learning center?
You can schedule an appointment with the learning center, from ship.edu under the Learning Center page.

The Learning Center is the university's primary academic resource center and is free to all Ship students. Our goal at the Learning Center is to help students develop skills and strategies that will enable them to become independent, active learners.
Okay what would you like to know about?
To schedule an appointment you can follow the steps on the ship.edu Learning Center page.
